birth_place.en: Queens, New York City, United States

description.zh-cn: 美国企业家、政治人物及媒体名人，第45、47任美国总统。以商界成就、媒体经历及以共和党人身份参与政治并出任总统而著名。
description.en: American entrepreneur, politician, and media personality, serving as the 45th and 47th President of the United States. He is known for his business achievements, media experience, and his political career as a Republican president.

description.zh-cn: 唐纳德·特朗普的第一任妻子，捷克裔美国商人和前模特。
description.en: First wife of Donald Trump, a Czech-American businesswoman and former model.

description.zh-cn: 唐纳德·特朗普的第二任妻子，美国女演员和电视名人。
description.en: Second wife of Donald Trump, an American actress and television personality.

description.zh-cn: 唐纳德·特朗普的第三任妻子，斯洛文尼亚裔美国前模特，曾担任美国第一夫人。
description.en: Third wife of Donald Trump, a Slovene-American former model who served as the First Lady of the United States.

description.zh-cn: 美国房地产开发商，唐纳德·特朗普的父亲。
description.en: American real estate developer and father of Donald Trump.

nodes.id: 玛丽·安妮·麦克劳德·特朗普

zh-cn: 玛丽·安妮·麦克劳德·特朗普

description.zh-cn: 唐纳德·特朗普的母亲。
description.en: Mother of Donald Trump.

description.zh-cn: 美国商人和电视名人，唐纳德·特朗普的长子。
description.en: American businessman and television personality, the eldest son of Donald Trump.

description.zh-cn: 美国商人和前总统顾问，唐纳德·特朗普的长女。
description.en: American businesswoman and former presidential advisor, the eldest daughter of Donald Trump.

description.zh-cn: 美国商人，唐纳德·特朗普的次子。
description.en: American businessman, the second son of Donald Trump.

description.zh-cn: 美国法律研究助理，唐纳德·特朗普的次女。
description.en: American legal research assistant, the second daughter of Donald Trump.

description.zh-cn: 唐纳德·特朗普的三子。
description.en: The third son of Donald Trump.

description.zh-cn: 美国两大主要政党之一。
description.en: One of the two major political parties in the United States.

description.zh-cn: 美国两大主要政党之一。
description.en: One of the two major political parties in the United States.

en: Reform Party of the United States of America

description.zh-cn: 美国的政党。
description.en: A political party in the United States.

description.zh-cn: 位于纽约州的一所军事寄宿学校。
description.en: A military boarding school in the state of New York.

nodes.id: 宾夕法尼亚大学沃顿商学院

zh-cn: 宾夕法尼亚大学沃顿商学院
en: Wharton School of the University of Pennsylvania

description.zh-cn: 宾夕法尼亚大学的商学院。
description.en: The business school of the University of Pennsylvania.

description.zh-cn: 位于美国宾夕法尼亚州费城的一所私立研究型大学。
description.en: A private research university in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania.

description.zh-cn: 位于美国纽约市的一所私立研究型大学。
description.en: A private research university in New York City.

description.zh-cn: 唐纳德·特朗普家族拥有的美国私营企业集团。
description.en: An American privately held conglomerate owned by the family of Donald Trump.

description.zh-cn: 由唐纳德·特朗普主持的美国电视真人秀节目。
description.en: An American reality television program hosted by Donald Trump.

description.zh-cn: 美国第58届总统选举，唐纳德·特朗普击败希拉里·克林顿当选。
description.en: The 58th U.S. presidential election, in which Donald Trump defeated Hillary Clinton.

description.zh-cn: 美国政治人物，曾在2016年美国总统选举中作为民主党候选人与唐纳德·特朗普竞争。
description.en: American politician who ran against Donald Trump as the Democratic nominee in the 2016 United States presidential election.

description.zh-cn: 美国第59届总统选举，乔·拜登击败时任总统唐纳德·特朗普。
description.en: The 59th U.S. presidential election, in which Joe Biden defeated incumbent President Donald Trump.

description.zh-cn: 美国政治人物，第46任美国总统，在2020年总统选举中击败唐纳德·特朗普。
description.en: American politician, the 46th President of the United States, who defeated Donald Trump in the 2020 presidential election.

description.zh-cn: 美国第60届总统选举，唐纳德·特朗普击败贺锦丽当选。
description.en: The 60th U.S. presidential election, in which Donald Trump defeated Kamala Harris.

description.zh-cn: 美国政治人物，第49任美国副总统，在2024年总统选举中作为民主党候选人与唐纳德·特朗普竞争。
description.en: American politician, the 49th Vice President of the United States, who ran against Donald Trump as the Democratic nominee in the 2024 presidential election.

description.zh-cn: 美利坚合众国的国家元首和政府首脑。
description.en: The head of state and head of government of the United States of America.

description.zh-cn: 美国政治人物，在唐纳德·特朗普的第一任期内担任第48任美国副总统。
description.en: American politician who served as the 48th Vice President of the United States during Donald Trump's first term.

description.zh-cn: 美国政治人物，在唐纳德·特朗普的第二任期内担任第50任美国副总统。
description.en: American politician serving as the 50th Vice President of the United States during Donald Trump's second term.

description.zh-cn: 美国律师，曾作为检察官参与麦卡锡主义时期的调查，后成为唐纳德·特朗普的个人律师和导师。
description.en: American lawyer known for his role as a prosecutor during McCarthyism, who later became Donald Trump's personal lawyer and mentor.

nodes.id: 跨太平洋伙伴关系协议

zh-cn: 跨太平洋伙伴关系协议

description.zh-cn: 一项多边自由贸易协定，美国在特朗普上任后退出。
description.en: A multilateral free trade agreement from which the United States withdrew after Trump took office.

description.zh-cn: 自2018年起，由美国总统唐纳德·特朗普发起的，在中华人民共和国与美利坚合众国之间发生的一系列贸易冲突。
description.en: A series of trade conflicts between the People's Republic of China and the United States, initiated by U.S. President Donald Trump starting in 2018.

description.zh-cn: 位于东亚的社会主义国家，在特朗普任期内与美国发生了激烈的贸易战。
description.en: A socialist state in East Asia that engaged in an intense trade war with the United States during the Trump administration.

description.zh-cn: 2021年1月6日，时任总统唐纳德·特朗普的支持者为推翻2020年总统选举结果而发动的暴力示威。事件导致特朗普第二次被弹劾，并被多个社交媒体平台封禁。
description.en: A violent protest on January 6, 2021, by supporters of then-President Donald Trump to overturn the 2020 presidential election results. The event led to Trump's second impeachment and his ban from several social media platforms.

description.zh-cn: 美国社交网络及微博客服务的公司。
description.en: An American social network and microblogging service company.

description.zh-cn: 美国社交媒体集团。
description.en: An American social media conglomerate.

description.zh-cn: 美国的视频分享网站。
description.en: An American video-sharing website.

description.zh-cn: Facebook公司的一款免费提供在线图片及视频分享的社交应用。
description.en: A free online photo and video sharing social application by Facebook, Inc.

description.zh-cn: 因特朗普-乌克兰丑闻，美国众议院对时任总统特朗普发起的弹劾案，最终在参议院被宣告无罪。
description.en: Impeachment proceedings initiated by the U.S. House of Representatives against then-President Trump over the Trump-Ukraine scandal, which ultimately resulted in acquittal by the Senate.

nodes.id: 第二次唐纳德·特朗普弹劾案

zh-cn: 第二次唐纳德·特朗普弹劾案

description.zh-cn: 因煽动国会山骚乱，美国众议院对总统特朗普发起的弹劾案，最终在参议院被宣告无罪。
description.en: Impeachment proceedings initiated by the U.S. House of Representatives against President Trump for incitement of the Capitol riot, which ultimately resulted in acquittal by the Senate.

nodes.id: 纽约州人民诉唐纳·川普案

zh-cn: 纽约州人民诉唐纳·川普案
en: The People of the State of New York v. Donald J. Trump

description.zh-cn: 一起针对唐纳德·特朗普的刑事案件，涉及伪造商业记录以掩盖“封口费”。特朗普被判34项罪名全部成立。
description.en: A criminal case against Donald Trump involving the falsification of business records to conceal "hush money" payments. Trump was convicted on all 34 felony counts.

en: Attempted assassination of Donald Trump in Pennsylvania

description.zh-cn: 特朗普在宾夕法尼亚州竞选集会期间遭遇的未遂暗杀事件。
description.en: An attempted assassination of Donald Trump during a campaign rally in Pennsylvania.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜民主主义人民共和国的最高领导人，曾与唐纳德·特朗普举行多次首脑会晤。
description.en: The supreme leader of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, who held multiple summits with Donald Trump.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的最高领导人，在特朗普任期内与美国展开贸易战，并曾多次会晤。
description.en: The paramount leader of the People's Republic of China, who engaged in a trade war with the United States and held multiple meetings with Trump during his presidency.

description.zh-cn: 俄罗斯联邦总统，曾公开表达对唐纳德·特朗普的支持。
description.en: President of the Russian Federation, who has publicly expressed support for Donald Trump.

relationships.target: 玛丽·安妮·麦克劳德·特朗普

description.zh-cn: 就读两年后转学。
description.en: Transferred after two years of study.

relationships.target: 宾夕法尼亚大学沃顿商学院

description.zh-cn: 特朗普赢得选举，当选美国第45任总统。
description.en: Trump won the election, becoming the 45th President of the United States.

description.zh-cn: 希拉里·克林顿在总统选举中败选。
description.en: Hillary Clinton lost the presidential election.

description.zh-cn: 特朗普在总统选举中败给乔·拜登，连任失利。
description.en: Trump lost the presidential election to Joe Biden, failing to win re-election.

description.zh-cn: 乔·拜登赢得选举，当选美国第46任总统。
description.en: Joe Biden won the election, becoming the 46th President of the United States.

description.zh-cn: 特朗普赢得选举，当选美国第47任总统。
description.en: Trump won the election, becoming the 47th President of the United States.

description.zh-cn: 贺锦丽在总统选举中败选。
description.en: Kamala Harris lost the presidential election.

relationships.target: 跨太平洋伙伴关系协议

description.zh-cn: 签署行政命令，正式宣布美国退出跨太平洋伙伴关系协议。
description.en: Signed an executive order to formally withdraw the United States from the Trans-Pacific Partnership.

description.zh-cn: 宣布对一系列中国货物征收进口税，开启了中美贸易战。
description.en: Announced tariffs on a range of Chinese goods, initiating the China-U.S. trade war.

description.zh-cn: 因乌克兰电话门事件遭到众议院弹劾，但未被参议院定罪。
description.en: Was impeached by the House of Representatives over the Ukraine scandal but was acquitted by the Senate.

relationships.source: 第二次唐纳德·特朗普弹劾案

description.zh-cn: 因煽动国会山骚乱遭到众议院弹劾，但未被参议院定罪。
description.en: Was impeached by the House of Representatives for incitement of insurrection at the Capitol but was acquitted by the Senate.

relationships.source: 纽约州人民诉唐纳·川普案

description.zh-cn: 特朗普在“封口费”刑事案中被控的34项罪名全部成立，成为美国历史上首位被刑事定罪的前总统。
description.en: Trump was found guilty on all 34 felony charges in the "hush money" criminal case, becoming the first former U.S. president to be convicted of a crime.

description.zh-cn: 被指控煽动其支持者冲击国会大厦，以图推翻2020年总统选举结果。
description.en: Accused of inciting his supporters to storm the Capitol in an attempt to overturn the 2020 presidential election results.

description.zh-cn: 因认定特朗普在国会山骚乱期间煽动暴力，推特宣布永久封禁其个人账号。
description.en: Due to the belief that Trump incited violence during the Capitol riot, Twitter announced a permanent ban on his personal account.

description.zh-cn: 永久封禁了特朗普的个人账号，后于2022年11月由埃隆·马斯克解封。
description.en: Permanently banned Trump's personal account, which was later reinstated by Elon Musk in November 2022.

description.zh-cn: 在国会山骚乱后封禁了特朗普的账号，后于2023年1月解封。
description.en: Banned Trump's account after the Capitol riot, which was reinstated in January 2023.

description.zh-cn: 在国会山骚乱后封禁了特朗普的账号，后于2023年3月解封。
description.en: Banned Trump's account after the Capitol riot, which was reinstated in March 2023.

description.zh-cn: 在国会山骚乱后封禁了特朗普的账号，后于2023年1月解封。
description.en: Banned Trump's account after the Capitol riot, which was reinstated in January 2023.

description.zh-cn: 在宾夕法尼亚州的竞选集会上遭遇枪击，耳朵受伤。
description.en: Was shot in the ear during an assassination attempt at a campaign rally in Pennsylvania.

description.zh-cn: 在美国佛罗里达州的海湖庄园举行为期两天的会晤。
description.en: Held a two-day meeting at the Mar-a-Lago estate in Florida, United States.

description.zh-cn: 分别在新加坡、越南河内和朝韩非军事区举行了三次历史性会晤。
description.en: Held three historic summits in Singapore, Hanoi (Vietnam), and the Korean Demilitarized Zone.

description.zh-cn: 特朗普多次表示希望与俄罗斯保持良好关系，普京也曾公开表达对特朗普的支持。
description.en: Trump has repeatedly expressed his desire for a good relationship with Russia, and Putin has publicly expressed support for Trump.
